title: Speaking with a customer service representative

content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Japanese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

Prerecorded message (Selection plays two times.)
content.question: What should you do in order to speak with a customer service representative?

choices.label: Leave a message with your telephone number

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
